content: these kodamas really glow in the dark kodamas are tree spirits you can make this a very special kind of amigurumi by using the glow in the dark yarn nightlights to make your kodamas go glowing at night create either a sitting or standing kodama who will be happy to dwell in your surrounding trees you can view the glow in the dark kodama in action in this video here http //www youtube com/watch v=xnz7t37p_ik
